document_data.name: Baerold
document_data.mainbody: '''Baerold''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: According to [[Ganrahast]] and [[Vainrence]], Baerold had suggested finding [[blueflame item]]s to command [[blueflame ghost]]s, which had left them quite suspicious he may be an agent from elsewhere. However, no amount of probing and divination revealed him to be more than an ambitious youngling. Thus, they simply slowed down his training and watched him carefully instead of taking harsher measures as of [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}.
